about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for a relentless journey in pursuit of a goal that will test your patience, skill, and strategy. Every jump is a gamble, and one mistake could mean losing all the progress you’ve made. The path to the top isn’t just solitary; it’s competitive, and only the most skilled will reach it first.

Gameplay:

  • Risks on every platform!

    The climb is grueling, and every move counts. The competition is fierce, with other players ready to overtake you at any moment. What seems like a simple jump becomes a test of precision, where the slightest slip can send you tumbling back down.

  • Hinder or benefit!
    In the game, you don’t just compete for ascension—you can use special abilities to surprise opponents and change the course of the match. Whether blocking paths or correcting mistakes, each ability adds a strategic layer, but reckless use can backfire. Balancing strategy with precision jumps is key to claiming victory.

  • Complete control over the jump!
    Jumping is your primary tool and demands absolute mastery. Hold to charge, release to leap—timing and force are critical. Each jump could mean overtaking an opponent or falling behind. In the online battlefield, every leap is a step closer to victory.

  • Plan before you leap!
    Sometimes, the most obvious path isn’t the safest. Once you’re airborne, there’s no turning back. Each jump requires careful consideration of the risks, especially with opponents watching and waiting to capitalize on any misstep.

  • The higher the jump, the greater the risk!
    The height of your jump can be your greatest ally or your biggest foe. Progress demands precision, as every mistake costs dearly and gives rivals a chance to surge ahead. Progress is saved automatically, but every fall can set you back significantly—and in a competitive world, losing time means losing the lead.

  • Challenging and addictive!
    Every jump is a lesson, and every fall is an opportunity to learn. The online competition isn’t just about individual skill but also how you handle the pressure of others climbing beside you. Challenge friends or players worldwide to see who can climb the highest without falling.

Climb, fall, learn, and repeat.

Every jump is a fresh chance to push your limits and prove you have what it takes to be the first to reach the top. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Jumpers League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A competitive online multiplayer platformer where every jump is a gamble. Climb to the top while using strategic abilities to outsmart your opponents, but beware: one misstep can cost you all your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
